body_html: @ghltshubh I remember seeing this problem before. I believe it has something to do with the build not finding the correct libraries. There is probably more hints in the error message you are getting. Also check to see in your build output if it is able to find your CUDA, NCCL, MPI libraries. Set your LD_LIBRARY_PATH to make sure they are found. Also I have not linked with spectrum-mpi, I link with openmpi 2.x built from source.
